channel.title: How do i get a custom member title?
channel.description: Casey has one, I can't seem to find it in my profile :|

BEGIN THE GREENY MOVEMENT.

item.title: How do i get a custom member title?
item.dc:creator: @Tree Tree
item.description:
@Tree wrote:

[quote=“XxKanexX, post:5, topic:201723”]Fuck off and die.
from Niall.[/quote]

I just asked him for a custom title.

Tree said: You are the one that i have been wanting to talk to. Tree said: [10:15:55] <&Niall> and if they want one [10:15:59] <&Niall> tel them to fuck off and die Tree said: Could you make an exception for me?

So far… no response. Wait, just got one then:

Ńĩąĺľ says: no sorry, you give 1 away and everyone else wants one Tree says: I'm the legendary Tree though...

Read full topic

item.title: How do i get a custom member title?
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

No they got it when Niall was giving them out but imo CM’s should have them.

EDIT:

[10:15:45] <&Niall> <`jason> Niall: more people are asking how come Casey etc get Custom titles
[10:15:52] <&Niall> I gave them when I first got administrator
[10:15:55] <&Niall> and if they want one
[10:15:59] <&Niall> tel them to fuck off and die

^That explains everything

Read full topic
